timeline.message:

Applied a listener on account menu button

Signed-off-by: Kilian Périsset <kilian.perisset@infomaniak.com>

Implemented view in listener + Pre-implemented menu inflating

Signed-off-by: Kilian Périsset <kilian.perisset@infomaniak.com>

Enabled the actions and the inflating for Accounts Management

Signed-off-by: Kilian Périsset <kilian.perisset@infomaniak.com>

Added account deletion feature

Signed-off-by: Kilian Périsset <kilian.perisset@infomaniak.com>

Replaced "Open" by "View Profile" and removed french translation for transifex

Signed-off-by: Kilian Périsset <kilian.perisset@infomaniak.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Please split this up in "onAccountClicked()" and "onOptionItemClicked(View v)".
onAccountClicked() -> can then directly open account, as it is now.
onOptionItemClicked(View v) -> can use v to either open up account or removal
This is then a bit more clean instead of having this all relied on the view type.
timeline.author: tobiasKaminsky

replies.bodyText: Done :D the interface methods have been splitted.
replies.author: Kilian-Perisset

timeline.message:
